testcase.name: Login as an authenticated user and navigates to Personal Information/MyAccount and updates the First name and confirms password and saves the record
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage...................................................passed And user take screenshot....................................................passed When user clicks on sign-in and navigates to Login page.....................passed And user enters "ravi.pathak0803@gmail.com" and "Automation@1234" and click login button.passed Then user clicks on My Personal Info link...................................passed Then user updates "Ravi" and confirms pass "Automation@1234" and save the record.passed Then user should see sucess message "Your personal information has been successfully updated.".passed And user take screenshot....................................................passed Then user logs out of the application.......................................passed
